itemDisplayName: Deploy a virtual machine with Azure Hybrid Benefit for Windows Server
description: This template allows you to deploy a VM with Azure Hybrid Benefit for Windows Server, using the latest patched version. The template will deploy a A2 size VM in the resource group location and return the FQDN of the VM.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Windows Server VM with Azure Hybrid Benefit, using the latest patched version of Windows.
